title: The Man from East Liverpool: Ben Feldman
creator_credit: Jay J. Sheridan and Jay J Sheridan and Company
brief_description: Instructional film on salesmanship and setting goals for yourself. Uses Insurance salesman Ben Feldman as the focus. He gives a background of himself and how he got to where he is today. He is shown in action conducting sales in real scenarios demonstrating the attitudes needed to achieve personal success.
